Save Money

The cost of electricity has rose by 40% in the past decade which makes solar the affordable option.




Increase Home Value

Solar panels add an average of $4965 per kilowatt to the resale value of homes.




Huge Tax Breaks

The Investment Tax Credit (ITC) allows you to deduct up to 26% of the cost of solar installation from your federal taxes.


Become an Ambassador

The process is simple.



Sign up

Follow this link to the Powur website, and sign up to be an ambassador. Powur will provide you with a referral link.



Share the details

Share the details with an interested homeowner and provide them with your refferal link



Get Paid

Every time your assigned consultant closes a deal with a client that you referred, Powur will pay you $1000

Become a Consultant

Join the movement and become an independant Powur Consultant!
